alert.note: Alert for Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:29PM CDT until August 06 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN TALLAPOOSA COUNTY... At 429 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hillabee Creek, or 7 miles east of Alexander City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Alexander City, Dadeville, Jacksons` Gap, New Site, Hillabee Creek, Northern Lake Martin, Eagle Creek, Horseshoe Bend and Horseshoe Bend National Military Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
